column1: New Derived Stats: Debuff Resistance, Armor Penetration, Hard Caps
Enemy Effective Armor = Enemy Armor × (1 - Armor Pen %)
Armor Reduction % = min(80%, Effective Armor / (Effective Armor + 100))
Final Damage = Stage 3 × (1 - Damage Type Resist) × (1 - Armor Reduction)
All stats have caps to prevent degenerate builds

column3: Cannot fully ignore armor, some always applies
2× attack speed max, prevents absurd DPS
2× cast speed max, prevents instant casts
3× damage max from all sources combined
3× base sprint, consistent with action speed
Prevents regen tanking, sustain viable but not broken
High regen for active playstyles, not infinite
Cannot full heal on every hit, moderate sustain
0.2× base duration, can reduce by 80% max
